channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: This entire road needs resurfacing urgently, 31st October
item.description:
Thankyou x

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21, Wimborne Avenue, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerously deformed road surface, 31st October
item.description:
This section of road on the southbound carriageway has a combination of potholes and ruts and ridges, made worse by being on the approach to a zebra crossing. As a 2-wheel rider, I risk being thrown off if I ride on my side of the carriageway, or alternatively have to head into the oncoming carriageway which is smoother but has oncoming traffic. This section of road needs urgent attention, but has been left to get worse for months on end. It’s only a matter of time before it causes a serious accident.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 49, City Road, Finsbury, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 ft sink hole near man hole cover, 31st October
item.description:
